title: Bug 3666: CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description:
Bug 3666: CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)

Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class.As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct. Steps:
1. UI can decide whether it wants to use the code assist end position (until the end of current identifier) or the cursor location it used to start with, so as to control the amount of source to replace. Removing code assist option.
